title: Like water for chocolate = Como agua para chocolate
creator_credit: Arau Films International and Alfonso Arau
brief_description: Multi-award winning Mexican film which tells the story of Tita who is forbidden by tradition and a tyrannical mother to marry Pedro. Tita finds solace for her suppressed passion and sorrow in her cooking, which has a profound effect on all who partake. Based on Laura Esquivel’s best-seller, “Like water for chocolate” is an enchanting film which radiates warmth and emotional depth. It is visual feast starring Marco Leonardi, Lumi Cavazos and Regina Torne. Spanish dialogue. English subtitles.
